pages.text: The Smart Wrench can be used to easily remove tech blocks and also select blocks for special functionality. $(br2)Use as a normal wrench: $(5)Sneak right click$() to pick up and $(5)right click$() to rotate.$(br2)$(5)Right click$() in the air to change mode
If the wrench is in $(thing)Select Mode$(), then it can be used to perform specialized operations on (for example) blocks like the Shield Projector.
